definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: king of Egypt, Solomon’s time (10th cent. B.C.), 1Ki 11:40, 1Ki 14:25 Qr (Kt [[שושק]]), = 2Ch 12:2, 2Ch 12:9, [[שִׁישָָׁק]] v:2Ch 12:5, v:2Ch 12:5, v:2Ch 12:7; = Šešonḳ I, first king of 22nd dynasty, Blau:ZMG xv (1861), 233 ff. Steind:BAS i. 351; = Sošenk WMM:As. u. Eur. 166 ff,; Ency. Bib. SHISHAK; cf. Griffith:Hast. DB SHISHAK. p. 1004
